No. COA17-483 Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed: February 6, 2018

In the MATTER OF the Foreclosure of a Deed of Trust Executed by Jason Lindsey SMITH and Shannon Friday Smith Dated April 27, 2007 and Recorded in Book 4315 at Page 2450 in the Gaston County Public Registry, North Carolina.

AFFIRMED.
